title: fix: remove unstable flux-2-dev, add qwen-character, update airforce pricing
author: voodoohop

gist.summary: Introduces the 'qwen-character' model for roleplay, optimizes Airforce model pricing, and streamlines available image models for better stability.
gist.impact: Users can now access a specialized text model for character interactions and enjoy reduced pricing on Airforce-powered generation.
gist.visual_concept: The Pollinations bee engaging in a roleplay dialogue with a pixel art fantasy character (representing the new Qwen model). The setting is a cozy, warm tavern or library, symbolizing the storytelling aspect. The removal of the unstable model is represented by a clean, organized space.
gist.image_prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of the Pollinations bee chatting with a pixelated fantasy adventurer character in a warm tavern. Soft lime green (#ecf874) and peach gradient background. Chunky retro sprites, dialogue bubbles with pixel text. Warm lighting, lo-fi vibes like Stardew Valley. Nostalgic but beautiful, emotionally warm.

image.prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of the Pollinations bee chatting with a pixelated fantasy adventurer character in a warm tavern. Soft lime green (#ecf874) and peach gradient background. Chunky retro sprites, dialogue bubbles with pixel text. Warm lighting, lo-fi vibes like Stardew Valley. Nostalgic but beautiful, emotionally warm.
